Title: Suspends sanctions for noncompliance with public assistance employment program requirements during a state of emergency declared pursuant to an executive order
Summary: Suspends sanctions for noncompliance with public assistance employment program requirements during a state of emergency declared pursuant to an executive order.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to suspending sanctions for noncompliance with public assistance employment program requirements during a state of emergency declared pursuant to an executive order
